entry.title: Drano - Professional Strength Kitchen Crystals & Drain Cleaner - 500 ml
entry.summary:
Vendor: Drano
Type: Disposables
Price: 11.99

Drano Full Clog Destroyer is a powerful drain cleaner that is specially formulated to take on the toughest clogs. The thick gel holds together to cut through standing water and attack built-up hair, gunk and soap scum. It gets to work fast, eliminating stubborn blockages and leaving your drain free-flowing and clog-free. Full Clog Destroyer is safe for all septic systems and pipes, including PVC, plastic, copper and old pipes. Keep your drains clear with Liquid-Plumr.

  1. Professional drain cleaner
  1. Clears stubborn fully blocked drains
  1. Special thick gel wont dilute as it cuts through the toughest clogs
  1. Safe for all pipes, including PVC, plastic, copper, old pipes and septic systems
  1. Saves time and money by empowering you to clear drains yourself

entry.title: First Chemical - Neutramax Apple Slice Deodorant - 4 L
entry.summary:
Vendor: First Chemical
Type: Disposables
Price: 14.99

Description:

NEUTRAMAX APPLE SLICE is a highly concentrated product which neutralizes odours quickly and will not leave a residue or stain. It eliminates odours on carpets, in garbage receptacles and dumps, and smoking odours. It can be mixed with other cleaning products without affecting its activity.

Use Directions:

1. Cleaning Tables and Booths: Add 1 oz NEUTRAMAX per liter cool water .

2. As an additive to floor mop solutions: Add 2 oz per gallon of solution

3. As an additive to carpet cleaners: Add 2 oz per gallon of solution

4. As an additive to general cleaners: Add 2 oz per gallon of solution

5. As an air freshener: Full strength or diluted with water to preference

6. Room Deodorizing: Add 2-4 oz./gallon of cold water. Spray solution lightly in the air to destroy offensive odours. Very effective.

7. Garbage receptacles and dumps: add 4 oz/gallon of cold water. Spray solution on source of problem. Controls and destroys obnoxious odours.

entry.title: Liao - Latex Household Gloves One Size - 1 Pair
entry.summary:
Vendor: Liao
Type: Disposables
Price: 2.79

Liao - Latex Household Gloves One Size - 1 Pair

Protect your hands from harmful chemicals and biological hazards with these multi-purpose gloves!

Made of durable, thick material, these gloves are allergen-, latex-, and powder-free, helping reduce the potential for some allergic reactions to develop. These gloves are ideal for food service operations, janitorial tasks, and schools.

Excellent Dexterity

These versatile gloves form comfortably to your hands to offer the tactile sensitivity. Plus, they also help reduce hand fatigue. Providing superior dexterity, they're great for food prep, machine maintenance, cleaning jobs, and a variety of other precision tasks.

Durable Material

Thick non-sterile gloves provide exceptional puncture, tear, and chemical resistance. Thanks to a textured exterior, they also provide a firm grip in both wet and dry situations.

Distinct Color

These gloves feature a distinctive blue color, allowing you to designate them for specific tasks.

entry.title: M2 Professionals - Trigger Sprayer Red & White - Each
entry.summary:
Vendor: M2 Professionals
Type: Disposables
Price: 1.99

M2 Professionals - Trigger Sprayer Red & White - Each

Keep your business sparkling clean with this plastic spray bottle!

Designed for industrial and residential use and molded of high density polyethylene, these plastic spray bottles are durable, leak-resistant, and will get the job done!

Easy Measuring

These plastic spray bottles are standard with a neck finish and feature molded in graduations that help when measuring cleaning solutions.

Label Free

Since the plastic bottles are not pre-labeled, you can label them however you want to control and organize your inventory of cleaning solution.
